attributes.action: A FULL disclosure of the facts regarding child abuse rings across the UK.
attributes.additional_details: Action needs to be taken to stop the ridiculous cover up that's going on in the UK, allowing British children to be abused sexually or otherwise, solely to prevent racial tensions is doing exactly what it was set out to prevent. The British people should have the right to the absolute truth, devoid of any omissions because they may offend the offenders, or cause hostilities towards those abusing our children, surely the community of the offenders, want to know the facts as well.
attributes.background: A full disclosure of all facts including, why this has been allowed, as it's still occurring? why the perpetrators feel this is okay? With 1400 children from one town having been abused, why hasn't someone from that community come forward with evidence, to help the victims of these heinous crimes.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Launch a Public Inquiry into Grooming Gangs
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/711976
